scripts.build: yarn swc-ts-build -s src -d dist/src -p tsconfig.build.json && cp -R ./src/helpers/ ./dist/src && yarn mirr -i './**/*.{proto,lua,crt,key,pem,json,so.node}' -x '**/node_modules/**' -x '**/dist/**' -x '**/.gemini/**' -x '**/{package,project,tsconfig,coverage-final,jest.config}.json' -x '../tsconfig.*.json' './dist' && cp -R ./dist/_declarations/* ./dist/ && rm -rf ./dist/_declarations
scripts.docs:md:core: (yarn typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --entryPoints src/core/index.ts --tsconfig tsconfig.json --excludeNotDocumented --hideBreadcrumbs --hideGenerator --hidePageHeader --searchInComments --searchInDocuments --useCodeBlocks --useCustomAnchors --flattenOutputFiles --out .temp-docs) && (yarn tsx src/bin/clean-md.ts ./wiki/core/Home.md)
scripts.docs:md:graphql: (yarn typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --entryPoints src/graphql/index.ts --tsconfig tsconfig.json --excludeNotDocumented --hideBreadcrumbs --hideGenerator --hidePageHeader --searchInComments --searchInDocuments --useCodeBlocks --useCustomAnchors --flattenOutputFiles --out .temp-docs) && (yarn tsx src/bin/clean-md.ts ./wiki/graphql/Home.md)
